MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G43 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:01am. Our engineers are onsite and have confirmed the loss of power is caused by damaged electrical equipment on the junction of Merrylee Road and Langside Road. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:51am on 17th January
